sqlMap.update: update master_employee set name = #name#, email = #email#, is_enabled = #isEnabled#, changed_by = #changedBy#, changed_date = sysdate where employee_id = #employeeId#
sqlMap.select: select employee_id as employeeId, name as name, email as email, is_enabled as isEnabled, created_by as createdBy, to_char(created_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as createdDate, changed_by as changedBy, to_char(changed_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as changedDate from master_employee where employee_id = #employeeId#

select employee_id as employeeId, name as name, email as email, is_enabled as isEnabled, created_by as createdBy, to_char(created_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as createdDate, changed_by as changedBy, to_char(changed_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as changedDate from master_employee

select employee_id as employeeId, name as name, email as email, is_enabled as isEnabled, created_by as createdBy, to_char(created_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as createdDate, changed_by as changedBy, to_char(changed_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as changedDate from master_employee where is_enabled = 1 order by employee_id
